summary: The Secret Service is a special police force in the United States. Their main jobs are to stop fake money from being made and to protect important people like the President, their families, and leaders from other countries who visit the U.S. They have been doing this since 1901. Before 2003, they worked under the Treasury Department, as they started by fighting currency counterfeiting. Now, they are part of the Department of Homeland Security.
title: United States Secret Service
